ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Good way to learn how to memorize lines and work on scenes. Good senior year class.
I didnt really. Just got to practice some scenes
I loved this class! I think that my acting and memorization skills really improved, and for the first time I understood what it meant to get into the mindset of an actor.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Strengths - great instructor, and a good introductory syllabus. Weaknesses - I wish we had the time to do more plays or go more in-depth with the ones we were studying.

The strengths are that it is a low pressure environment where you can improve your acting. weaknesses are that it is sometimes a not very engaging or dynamic course as you spend most of your time watching others perform.
Not good bc not dynamic enough: not engaging or challenging.

The issue isnt the course or the instructor, its that is wasnt an intermediate acting course. Because 210 is no longer a requirement, the course was filled with people who should have been in beginning acting. Because of this, people who have more experience acting did not learn much because the course had to be tailored for those who didnt. I understand why 210 is no longer a requirement for the directing course, but beginning acting should still be required to be taken before intermediate acting.
Activities to open class were sometimes repetitive, but it was still really enjoyable! It was so easy to engage and interact with other class members.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I had a lot of fun this semester. I think the structure of the course is also very accessible to non-majors.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student
I would definitely recommend this course. It was a lot of fun
If it remains open to everyone, this course will not be helpful to you if you are an experienced actor looking to grow
Definitely! It is a ton of fun.
